WidgetsDirective
================


.. php:namespace:: ILab\Stem\External\Blade\Directives

.. php:class:: WidgetsDirective


	.. rst-class:: phpdoc-description
	
		| Class ScriptDirective\.
		
		| Adds a \`@widget\(\'name\-of\-script\.js\'\)\` directive to Blade templates that displays a sidebar widget area
		| 
		| Usage:
		| 
		| \`\`\`
		
	
	:Parent:
		:php:class:`ILab\\Stem\\Core\\ViewDirective`
